functionDecorators.name: borrow
functionDecorators.description: DSProxy borrows tokens from the Compound protocol.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be borrowed.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: User deposits tokens to the DSProxy. User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be deposited.

functionDecorators.name: enterMarket
functionDecorators.description: Enters the Compound market so it can be used as collateral.

functionDecorators.name: enterMarkets
functionDecorators.description: Enters the Compound market so these token can be used as collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: _cTokenAddrs
parameterDecorators.description: CToken address array to enter market.

functionDecorators.name: exitMarket
functionDecorators.description: Exits the Compound market so it can't be deposited/borrowed.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrow
functionDecorators.description: User paybacks tokens to the Compound protocol. User needs to approve the DSProxy to pull the _tokenAddr tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be payedback.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: User withdraws tokens from the DSProxy.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddr
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be withdrawn.
